title: Justin

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player, they will be renamed to "Justin". This player may not change their name.
- Alternatively you may self-protect, redirecting each visitor to a *Justin*. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players named *Justin* cannot be targeted by their old name. Instead, players can choose to target *Justin*.
- If a player targets *Justin*, they will target a random *Justin*.
- If a player votes *Justin*, all *Justin*s gain a vote. By the end of the day, if *Justin* has the most votes, all *Justin*s are lynched.
- Once you die, all *Justin*s are renamed back to their original names.

desc:
Post 5468
*it's basically Jane the Game but less chaotic*
Defence: None
